# isCopyingOperation

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the print operation is an EPS or PDF copy operation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isCopyingOperation: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver is an EPS or PDF copy operation; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: isCopyingOperation
